resources.string: Allows application to receive CAD Pages containing information about emergency response calls. Malicious applications could use this to access personal information connected with these calls

If we know your phone number, we can better identify subscription problems or problems with direct paging vendors. Granting this permission is not required. If you do not do it, we will do the best we can without this information.
We are about to perform an automatic recalculation of your subscription status. We need to know who you are so can find any subscription information we have associated with you.
You appear to have restored a Cadpage configuration from an old backup. We need to retrieve your device serial number so we can determine if the backup was made from the same or a different device.
We need to know who you are so can find any subscription information we have associated with you.
The vendor you are trying to register with requires information about who you are to help identify your account on their system.
You are asking Cadpage to use a user selectable ringtone, which may be located on your external SD card.
For unknown reasons, the Android system will not show Cadpage notification alerts until you grant data storage permission.
OsmAnd support requires access to your current location
You are requesting Cadpage access to your email account information. To do this, we will need to identify your Google email accounts.
Active911 would like to report your real time location to other responders. Since the navigation app may be running on top of Cadpage, this also requires background location access.
This action is not advised on roaming network
Do you really want to delete all call history?
This feature requires some version of the Scanner Radio application be installed. Would you like to install it now?
This feature requires a current version of the Scanner Radio application. Would you like to install it now?
Would you like Cadpage to report your real time location to other responders?
You have turned on an audio alert for the notification category that Cadpage uses when it is doing it\'s own audio alerts. This will result and duplicate audio alerts which is not what you want.
Let me fix the notification category configuration
How to change the alert vibrate setting
Changing the vibration setting now requires changing the system notification configuration settings.
To turn vibrations off, turn off the vibrate setting.
To turn vibrations off, open advanced settings and turn off the vibrate setting.
To turn vibrations on, turn on the vibrate setting.
To turn vibrations on, open advanced settings and turn on the vibrate setting.

To turn vibrations on without messing with the audio alert override
 1) Regular dispatch alerts must be turned on
 2) Importance must be set to "High: Make sound"
 3) Sound must be set to "None"
 4) Vibrate setting must be turned on

To turn vibrations on without messing with audio alert override
 1) Show notifications must be turned on
 2) Behavior must be set to "Make sound"
 3) Open advanced settings
 4) Sound must be set to "None"
 5) Vibrate setting must be turned on
%1$s is required to view these map pages. Would you like to install %1$s now.
Cadpage needs the following permissions to perform this operation.
